src:
Anies Hingga Khofifah Diundang Ke Kongres Nasdem
02 Nov 2019, 22:13 by Alfreds Tuter


Anies Hingga Khofifah Diundang Ke Kongres Nasdem

KBRN, Jakarta: Partai Nasdem menyatakan akan mengundang Gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan dan Gubernur Jawa Timur, Khofifah Indar Parawansa ke Kongres Nasdem yang akan dilaksanakan 8 November 2019 mendatang.Ketua DPP Nasdem, Willy Aditya mengatakan rencananya Anies akan memberikan sambutan langsung kepada para peserta kongres yang berasal dari berbagai daerah di Indonesia. Mengingat Anies merupakan kepala daerah tpat berlangsungnya Kongres Nasdem ini."Sebagai Gubernur, wajarlah dia memberikan sambutan dan memberikan ucapan selamat datang kepada peserta kongres yang dari Sabang sampai Merauke datang ke Ibu Kota ya," ucapnya di Kedai Sirih Merah, Kebon Sirih, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/2019).Selain itu, alasan partainya mengundang kedua tokoh itu lantaran keduanya dianggap memiliki kedekatan secara Emosional dan Kultural dengan Partai besutan Surya Paloh ini.Kita harus ingat, Mas Anies dan Bu Khofifah itu deklarator Nasional Demokrat, Bu Khofifah itu sama kaya Ridwan Kamil, diusung pertama kali oleh NasDem. Jadi kami undang, tapi juga ada beberapa gubernur lain," tuturnya.Sehingha Willy menampik jika kehadiran keduanya dalam kongres berkaitan dengan sosok yang akan diusung oleh Partai Nasdem di Pemilu 2024 mendatang, meski di kongres kata Willy juga akan ada pembahasan terkait persiapan kontestasi 5 tahunan tersebut.'Oh tentu, Pemilu 2024 kami bahas. Tapi yang menjadi penting, bukan hanya Mas Anies ya, ada Bu Khofifah juga kami undang dan beberapa gubernur yang dari NasDem," ungkapnya."Masih jauh, Belanda masih jauh," tegas Willy.Menurut rencana Kongres Nasdem akan dilaksanakan mulai tanggal 8-11 November 2019 di Jakarta International Expo, Kemayoran. Kongres kata Willy juga akan dihadiri langsung Presiden, Jokp Widodo."Iya nanti di puncak acara tanggal 11, Presiden hadir bertepatan dengan hut juga," tambahnya.
text:
Anies Until Khofifah Invited to Nasdem Congress
02 Nov 2019, 22:13 by Alfreds Tuter


Anies Until Khofifah Invited to Nasdem Congress

KBRN, Jakarta: Nasdem Party said it would invite the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan and the Governor of East Java, Khofifah Indar Parawansa to the Nasdem Congress which will be held on 8 November 2019. The Chairperson of Nasdem's DPP, Willy Aditya, said that Anies plans to give a direct greeting to the participants of the Nasdem Congress which will be held on 8 November 2019. congress that originated from various regions in Indonesia. "Considering that Anies is the head of the region where the Nasdem Congress took place." As the Governor, it was natural for him to give a speech and give a greeting to congress participants from Sabang to Merauke coming to the Capital, yes, "he said at Kedai Sirih Merah, Kebon Sirih, Central Jakarta On Saturday (11/02/2019). Besides, the party's reason for inviting the two figures was because both of them were considered to have emotional and cultural closeness with this party from Surya Paloh. We must remember that Mas Anies and Mrs. Khofifah were Democratic National Declarators, Mrs. Khofifah was just as rich as Ridwan Kamil, first brought up by NasDem. "So we invite, but there are also a number of other governors," he said. So that Willy denied that the presence of both of them in the congress was related to the figure that would be carried by the Nasdem Party in the upcoming 2024 Election, although in the congress Willy said there would also be discussions related to the preparation of the 5 year contestation "Of course, we discussed the 2024 election. But the important thing is not only Mas Anies, we also invited Mrs. Khofifah and several governors from NasDem," he said. "Still far, the Netherlands is still far away," Willy said. According to the plan Nasdem Congress will be held from 8-11 November 2019 at the Jakarta International Expo, Kemayoran. Willy said that the Congress will also be attended by the President, Jokp Widodo.
